Articles.Content:
I didn't see a Mac support place, so I'm posting this here.  I've been playing stock KSP on my Mac M1 Catalina for a while without issues, but when I tried modding it (with RP-1 and associated mods) it didn't work.  What I'm wondering is, has anyone gotten these to work on an M1?  I haven't seen anything on the internet to suggest someone has. 

If you have, I would really appreciate help in resolving the issue.  Of course, I can share the details of the failure and the log file if needed.
